Text:
Thanks as always for sharing, always appreciated.

I was wondering if i could please request for you to upload Ed Sheeran- The A Team if you're able to get your hands on this it would be great.

This is an awesome song and means a lot to the world and would really love to be able to have it too.

I will be uploading a Subtitle Music Video with a lot of your clips as a Conjunction and appreciation for your efforts and sharing with us.

Thanks in advance.

MDSM

User Type: top notch music vids anyway & all the best"
